title: Mobile devices used by U.S. students 2015 , by type and frequency
labels: A few times a month or less
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 4 different Responses on X-axis for 3 groups Never, A few times a month or less, and 2-3 times per week or more. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.

Response Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer had the maximum Share of respondents among all 3 groups, and it was for Never. The minimum Share of respondents was observed in Response Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer for A few times a month or less.

In Response Laptop notebook or Chromebook, 2-3 times per week or more had the highest Share of respondents among all 4 Responses and it has the lowest Share of respondents in Response Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer.
Response Laptop notebook or Chromebook and Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer had the biggest gap of 51.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for 2-3 times per week or more.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 4 different Responses on X-axis for 3 groups Never, A few times a month or less, and 2-3 times per week or more. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.

Response Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer had the maximum Share of respondents among all 3 groups, and it was for Never. The minimum Share of respondents was observed in Response Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer for A few times a month or less.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 4 different Responses on X-axis for 3 groups Never, A few times a month or less, and 2-3 times per week or more. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.

Response Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer had the maximum Share of respondents among all 3 groups, and it was for Never. The minimum Share of respondents was observed in Response Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer for A few times a month or less.

In Response Laptop notebook or Chromebook, 2-3 times per week or more had the highest Share of respondents among all 4 Responses and it has the lowest Share of respondents in Response Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer.
Response Laptop notebook or Chromebook and Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer had the biggest gap of 51.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for 2-3 times per week or more.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of respondents on the Y-axis for 4 different Responses for 3 groups Never, A few times a month or less, and 2-3 times per week or more that are presented on the X-axis.

Response Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer had the maximum Share of respondents among all 3 groups, and it was for Never. The minimum Share of respondents was observed in Response Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer for A few times a month or less.
Among all the Responses, 2-3 times per week or more had the highest Share of respondents 61.0 in Response Laptop notebook or Chromebook and lowest value 10.0 in Response Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer.
There is a gap of 51.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for 2-3 times per week or more in Response Laptop notebook or Chromebook and Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer.
Out of all 3 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Share of respondents was found in case of Never.

In Response Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer, Never had the highest Share of respondents 84.0 among the 3 groups and in Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer, A few times a month or less had the lowest Share of respondents 5.0. The second highest Share of respondents 61.0 was observed for Never in Response Hybrid or 2 in 1 computer.
Averaging all 3 groups Never, A few times a month or less, and 2-3 times per week or more, the Response Tablet is the maximum Share of respondents and Smartphone is the minimum Share of respondents.
